concept.title: Offset Field
concept.shortdesc: MongoDB uses the offset field to track the data to read. By default, the MongoDB origin uses the _id field as the offset field.

conbody.p: MongoDB originoffset fieldYou can use any Object ID field as the offset field, but the results for other fields are not guaranteed.
Object ID fields include an embedded timestamp. The origin uses the embedded timestamp to determine where in the collection to begin reading based on the start timestamp that you provide.
